Class UndergraduateStudent

java.lang.Object
Student
UndergraduateStudent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Searchable
public class UndergraduateStudent extends Student
The UndergraduateStudent class represents a student enrolled in an undergraduate program. It extends the Student class and adds information specific to undergraduates, such as year level.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final double
    TUITION_RATE
    The tuition rate per credit hour for undergraduate students.
    private int
    yearLevel
    The year level of the undergraduate student (e.g., 1 for freshman, 2 for sophomore, etc.).
